sentences.en: An awful lot of people with depression suffer unnecessarily because of a fear of using medication, but it can be very effective.
sentences.cn: 一个可怕的抑郁症的人很多遭受不必要的，因为使用药物的恐惧，但它可以是非常有效的。

sentences.en: Certainly he wasn't going to involve his uncle unnecessarily.
sentences.cn: 当然他不想把他的叔叔不必要地卷进去.

sentences.en: Don't cloud the issue, ie Don't make it unnecessarily complicated.
sentences.cn: 不要把问题搞得复杂化.

sentences.en: I don't want to bother anybody unnecessarily.
sentences.cn: 没必要的话,我不想打扰任何人.

sentences.en: I don't want to invade your private life unnecessarily.
sentences.cn: 我不想过多地干涉你的私生活.

sentences.en: It's a waste of words . And it unnecessarily limits you on calls.
sentences.cn: 怎么 说都是在浪费口舌,无关紧要地限制你.

sentences.en: Not only this, she read them aloud and put down quite unnecessarily words we already knew.
sentences.cn: 同时读着,同时连教师随手写的、已经不必要的、读过的熟字, 她也记了下来.

sentences.en: Otherwise, it will be lost – and at an unnecessarily high cost.
sentences.cn: 否则, 这仗就会打输——而且付出的是不必要的高昂代价.

sentences.en: Some parents worry unnecessarily about their children.
sentences.cn: 有些父母不必要地为孩子担心.

sentences.en: Strict adherence to metaphors ties interfaces unnecessarily to the workings of the physical world.
sentences.cn: 刻意遵照隐喻会将界面和物理世界的事物不必要地绑在一起.

sentences.en: The agency has been vilified by some doctors for being unnecessarily slow to approve life-saving drugs.
sentences.cn: 该机构因对救生药物的审批速度太慢而备受一些医生的诟病。

sentences.en: The report paints an unnecessarily bleak picture of the town.
sentences.cn: 这份报道把这个镇子描绘得过于惨淡.

sentences.en: The silence lengthened as Thorne unnecessarily shuffled some papers.
sentences.cn: 索恩整理着一些本无须整理的文件，沉默还在延续。

sentences.en: They have pulled out patients' teeth unnecessarily.
sentences.cn: 他们毫无必要地拔掉了病人的牙。

sentences.en: This will only eat up memory unnecessarily.
sentences.cn: 这样只会不必要地消耗内存。

sentences.en: What you should not do is prevent or override it unnecessarily.
sentences.cn: 您不应该做的是不必要地阻止或重写它。

sentences.en: Your Highness is taking offence very unnecessarily.

words.tran_cn: 不必要的；多余的，无用的

trans.tran_cn: 不必要地，多余地，不需要地
